name: Grill Everything: Steak Edition
description:
Barbeque season is coming up, and things are getting kinda sweaty in here. It's time to grill!

Featuring endless gameplay that gets harder the longer you play!

Controls & Game info:

  • Left click
  • Hold left click

Move steaks to the grill with your mouse

Make sure to set the correct temperature on the grill by holding down left-click on the temperature regulator. But don't overcook it! 

Made by:

Edvin Danielsson, Gregory Sastrawidjaya, Caisesiume
